title: FS t206 oddity russ ford ghost image / tolstoi sgc 40 going to auction house
author: where the gold at?

posts.post_title: FS t206 oddity russ ford ghost image / tolstoi sgc 40 going to auction house
posts.post_content:
up for sale is a t206 russ ford tolstoi back sgc 40 3. as you can see by the scan it has a slight ghost image. Sent to auction house

thank you for you time,
stefan
I wouldn't call that a ghost...it looks more off register to me. Probably a red/pink plate.

That's what most T206 collectors refer to as a 'ghost'.

Very interesting card - good luck with your sale.
Sort of tomato tomahto but I don't consider it a ghost if it is the same pose...it, to me, is a printing error but not a ghost because it was the intended plate.

[quote name="bbcard1" post=1132082]Sort of tomato tomahto but I don't consider it a ghost if it is the same pose...it, to me, is a printing error but not a ghost because it was the intended plate.[/QUOTE]

Okay, so you don't, but the seller and most other T206 collectors do.

In my opinion this is a slight ghost image. And a cool card hence why I'm taking offers if you don't believe this is a ghost then don't make an offer on the card. Thank you for your time and good luck with your offers.
Stefan

Btw if no one bites I'm sending it to an auction house.

thanks but ill pass at $175. sorry didnt see this until today.
stefan
